item.title: EU tries to forge new climate targets before COP30 summit in Brazil next week
item.description: The European Union is working to establish new climate goals before the U.N. climate talks in Brazil starts next week

item.title: Typhoon Kalmaegi leaves 26 dead, people trapped on roofs, cars submerged
item.description: Philippine disaster response officials say that Typhoon Kalmaegi has left at least 26 people dead

item.title: China blames Netherlands for chip supply tensions amid Nexperia standoff
item.description: China's Commerce Ministry has blamed the Netherlands for what it called “chaos” in the semiconductor supply chain
